TITLE: FIU notifies fresh money laundering, terror financing reporting alerts for capital markets
AUTHOR: Daily Excelsior
DESCRIPTION: New Delhi, Apr 28: A fresh set of alert indicators have been issued by Indias financial intelligence unit (FIU) for capital markets, insurance companies, online payment gateway intermediaries and crypto currency service providers for effective checking of suspicious transactions in their channels as part of the anti-money laundering and counter-terrorism financing regime.
